https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8lCLU3vMgauPutirtcbHDC3pRUI.jpg 1942, in the middle of Northeastern Brazil, two very different men meet along the road: Johan, an aspirin salesman avoiding the German draft, and Ranulpho, a rural Brazilian seeking escape from the drought.
